meeting: 1. Alert team members about upcoming meeting via email.
2. Team member can add (suggest) new meeting agenda.
3. Prioritize meeting agenda based on your team member opinion.
6. Send meeting memo to team via email.
regular: 4. View graphical representation of the Poll, via Bar Chart, Pie Chart and Polar Area Chart.
5. View poll result in real time.
6. Notify team about the poll via email
